Name: MACE: Mapinguari's Temple
About the game: Play with up to 10 players online, venture deep into the Mapinguari's Temple and collect all three hidden artifacts to ensure a successful expedition! Be careful, however, for not only a dreaded monster roams the Temple's corridors but also an amalgam of deadly traps and a deceitful cultist, disguised between you. Explorers: Win by collecting all the three idols hidden inside the dungeon. Talk to nearby players (or using the radio) to coordinate the exploration. Find the lost gun so the bodyguard isn't alone defending you comrades, and do it before the cultist finds it first. move items around, such as keys or barrels, and solve the puzzles scattered throughout the dungeon. Cultist: Summon the Mapinguari so it may hunt down your enemies (be careful, he may kill you as well). Be the last one alive to win the game! Use tricks such as turning off all the lights, blocking paths with objects, or stealing and hiding the idols!! Find the lost gun to slow down or even kill the other players. Travel the dungeon quickly through secret passages only you can access. Bodyguard: Be the judge, jury and executioner, as only you starts the game with a gun. Be careful, for everyone knows who the bodyguard is. Protect the explorers and hunt down the cultist. Slow down the monster with your bullets. MACE: Mapinguari's Temple is a game where you can: Talk in-game with other players, either by proximity or usign the radio function. Customize your experience: not up for a competitive game? Play without a cultist and transform the game into a group horror game. Choose a character to play and customize it by changing it's colors! Play with accessibility features , such as high contrast. Find any match quickly by searching the server list!
